## Open-Source Projects

- **jaxDecomp** — JAX bindings to NVIDIA **cuDecomp** for multi-GPU domain decomposition on large 3D grids.  
  Repo: https://github.com/DifferentiableUniverseInitiative/jaxDecomp
- **JaxPM** — Particle-mesh cosmological simulations in JAX (multi-accelerator friendly).  
  Repo: https://github.com/DifferentiableUniverseInitiative/JaxPM
- **FURAX** — Building blocks for inverse problems in astro/cosmo with JAX; used for **CMB** component separation.  
  Repo: https://github.com/CMBSciPol/furax
- **jax-healpy** — JAX-native HEALPix/Healpy utilities (GPU-ready, autodiff-aware).  
  Repo: https://github.com/CMBSciPol/jax-healpy
- **jax-grid-search** — Distributed grid search/optimization on top of JAX/Optax.  
  Repo: https://github.com/ASKabalan/jax-grid-search

**Contributions**  
- **S2FFT** — Differentiable spherical/Wigner transforms (JAX & PyTorch).  
  *My contribution:* translated part of the **spherical harmonics** algorithm to **CUDA** to avoid long **JAX** JIT compile times.  
  Repo: https://github.com/astro-informatics/s2fft
